data.title: Joe Boyle on LinkedIn: Wait. What? Runtime Rundown is in the top 10% of podcasts worldwide! üòÆ‚Ä¶
data.meta_description: Wait. What? Runtime Rundown is in the top 10% of podcasts worldwide! üòÆ How did that happen? You made that happen, dear listeners. You!
data.text:
Dear Friends, I have changed the format of my podcasts, as I try to make them valuable to my subscribers. If you find this episode valuable please consider subscribing to my substack - Deacon Bengochea Newsletter and share it with anyone you think might be interestd. https://lnkd.in/ezda6yxu

Podcasts are hard as hell. Beyond the obvious cost of creating for years thanklessly, they've also never been more competitive. It doesn't mean there isn't opportunity launching a pod. It just means you're competing with millions to win a handful of spots on a consumer's phone vs. thousands just a few years ago. Your best chance of winning with a podcast is to win in one of three ways: 1) Niche down & crush it for a very specific audience 2) Innovate on format 3) Be a massive star

I want to remind you to get that negativity out your ears! It's time to cut "them" out and get your mind right! Start listening to practical, optimistic, solution oriented, accountable content that makes you feel in control! Let this post be the one that finally tips you over and finally adjust who you spend time with, what podcasts you listen to, which accounts you follow... audit your ears üôå

Happy #InternationalPodcastDay! Podcasts have greatly enhanced our leisure time. So let‚Äôs take the day and give love to our content creators that make them. Comment below what your favorite podcasters and let‚Äôs widen our list together. #CatchTheSEAWave

Unleash Your Full Potential: Let Go of the Need to Become More Clip is from S.6 Ep.3 of Dualistic Unity Title: ‚ÄúThe Myth of Happiness‚Äù Check out Dualistic Unity wherever you listen to podcasts!

I want to remind you, Get that Negativity out of your ears!!! It's time to "cut" them out..... sort your mind. and get it right! Start listening to practical, optimistic, solution oriented, accountable content that makes you feel in control. Let this post be the one that insires you and tips you over to finally adjust who you spend time with, what podcasts you listen to, and which accounts you follow! audit your ears!

I want to remind you to eliminate negativity from your life. It's time to remove toxic influences. Focus on getting your mind right! Begin engaging with practical, optimistic, solution-focused, and accountable content that empowers your business and enhances your sense of control. Let this post be the one that motivates you to reassess who you spend time with, what podcasts you listen to, and which accounts you follow.
